strings.Value: "Greetings!" {n}Mim's face shines with enthusiasm.{/n} "The trade in your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} is so lively that I'm literally overflowing with commissions! It's splendid! – The more interesting the challenge, the better!"

"Greetings. I've decided to take a break and spent some time traveling your lands, and I'm surprised how well things are going here in your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}! Trade is thriving, and I can easily acquire rare materials and gemstones for my jewelry. And there are so many talented people around! I left Restov to enjoy the peace and solitude of a simple country life, but I must admit — I've missed the company of other artists!"
"Finally! I have labored long on a special present for you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. Mim is the best, isn't she?"
